arStrings.szText:
Gain a bonus based on the weapon type you wield. Casting a {c_important}Focus{/c} Skill doubles this bonus for {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds: 
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Glaive:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%+|]{/c} Bonus Lucky Hit Chance
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Quarterstaff:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|+%|]{/c} Blocked Damage Reduction
{icon:bullet,1.2} {c_label}Polearm:{/c} {c_number}[{SF_3}*100|%+|]{/c} Lucky Hit Chance to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}
